value.stringValue: The Invocable_Project_Statuses-8 invocable process failed to start because no records in your org match the record Id specified. In the entities that invoke Invocable_Project_Statuses-8, such as other processes, check the value for this input: SObjectId.

The Invocable_Project_Statuses-8 invocable process failed to start because a valid value wasn't found. This can happen when entities that invoke Invocable_Project_Statuses-8, such as other processes, don't have values for either the SObject or SObjectId. For example: -An SObject or SObject ID wasn't specified. -A value might have been included, but it was null at runtime.

rules.name: myRule_3
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 9) AND (7 OR 8)
rules.label: Identification Statuses

Flow.description: Project Statuses that change Project Phase
Flow.label: Project (INV) - Update Phase
